refnamediv.refpurpose: print the number of processing units available

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Print the number of processing units available to the current process, which may be less than the number of online processors

listitem.para: print the number of installed processors
if possible, exclude N processing units
GNU coreutils online help: <http://www.gnu.org/software/coreutils/> Report nproc translation bugs to <http://translationproject.org/team/>

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: The full documentation for nproc is maintained as a Texinfo manual. If the info and nproc programs are properly installed at your site, the command
should give you access to the complete manual.
